reviewText: Henry Higgins wins a bet with Colonel Pickering  to turn a guttersnipe into a lady. The problem iswhat to do with her when the experiment is over. This movie is a faithful rendering of the Shaw play. No color, glitz, or music as in My Fair Lady. The acting is superb, and Wendy Hiller is the perfect Eliza Doolittle. This film is a delightful dramedya filmed version of the classic playa cinematic treasure that is must see viewing.
